name: Fancy Solitaire
summary: Everyone's favourite card game is back for 2021, now with fancy 3D graphics! Known alternatively as Klondike, or Patience in some parts of the world, this game includes both Draw 1 and Draw 3 variations. Featuring dozens of customisation options for deck styles and table styles, and a selection of music, play in your own way! Are you a Solitaire master? Try out the Leaderboards and stats to see your global rank. Become the best player and the trophy is yours! Solitaire has never looked this good!
